reviewText: Not working at this time, the app will start in its static poaition and maybe crash.  Once you get in a working game the controlls are nuts. my screen was stuck in rotation for about 2 minnuets i had to close the game before i got sick.  I would wait on this one.  This needs some support for sure.

reviewText: Was not able to get it working on either VIVE or Oculus.  Vive for a few seconds was able to get to the start hallway and select screen, then flashed out.  On second reboot it auto-pulled up theater mode and wouldn't start.  On Oculus the start menu was upside down and inverted.  The controls moved opposite as expected.  On neither my XBOX controller was able to provide any input.  Requested refund.
voteText: 7 of 8 people (88%) found this review helpful

reviewText:
Very basic and short demo.  Should be free, but devs gotta eat i guess?

Got it to work on the Vive, but it's a bit buggy.  I used a Xbox One as the controller, Vive controllers did nothing despite tinkering.  To make matters worse, for whatever reason, the simple controls were a bit scrambled.  Theres a stick, that controls rotation (both the right and left sticks on the controller seems to work for this), but the thrust button which by the brief instuctions should be the RB (right bumper) button, but didnt work at all.  Pushing my right stick forward activated thrust, very weird.  Same for the 'fire' command (LB button by instructions), only used once at the end, and I just pressed everything and something worked.

When I say short"
date: I mean 3-5 minutes short. Zero replayablity.\n\nAnd as a first for me
recommended: got a bit queezy in that short time ( the pod your flying around in
hoursPlayed: is constantly moving in weird ways at the start in which you have no control-- Probaby and awsome feature for the Moveo pod this game was designed for
voteText: but not so great for home VR).\n\nHold out for it to turn free?"

reviewText: Very bad performance (980ti), and controller didn't work as it should. This experience should not have been released in it current state. I couldn't finish it.
